EmailTemplate.subject: Hot Insights! 2022 Ecommerce Trends That You Need to Know
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Did you know that online grocery sales are projected to increase by 23% each year? That’s a major revenue stream that you don’t want to miss out on—and if you have an eCommerce solution that’s eating up your margins, there’s a chance you’re missing out on quite a bit of cash. Other eCommerce solutions chew up your margins quick and give you a limited view into your customer data. And unfortunately, you lose control of your customer experience and sacrifice quality delivery, too.
